channel.title: Music – Al Martino
channel.description: Recent content in Al Martino on Music

item.title: Al Martino - I Love You More And More Everyday
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 8868

I love you more
and more everyday
They said our love
was just emotion
That time would
slowly fade away
But time’s just
deepened my devotion
I love you more
and more everyday
The day you made
those tender vows
Beside me
my joy was
More than words
could ever say
And darling
still it grows
And grows inside me
I love you
More and more
everyday
The day you made
those tender vows
Beside me
my joy was
More than words
could ever say
And darling
still it grows
And grows inside me
I love you
More and more
everyday
I love you more
and more everyday-

item.title: Al Martino - Love Is Blue
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 8886

Blue blue
my world is blue
Blue is my world
now I’m without you
Grey grey
my life is grey
Cold is my heart
since you went away
Red red
my eyes are red
Crying for you
alone in my bed
Green green
my jealous heart
I doubt you
and now we’re apart
When we met
how the bright
Sun shine
then love died
Now the rainbow
is gone-

Black black
the nights I’ve known
Longing for you
so lost and along
Gone gone the love
we knew blue is
My world now
I’m without you
When we met
how the bright
Sun shone
then love die
Now the rainbow
is gone-
Black black
the night I’ve known
Longing for you
so lost and alone
Blue blue
my world is blue
Blue is my world
now I’m without you-

item.title: Al Martino - Spanish Eyes
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 8674

Blue spanish eyes
tearsdrops are falling
From your spanish
eyes
Please
please don’t cry
This is just adios
and not goodbye soon
I’ll return
bringing you
All the love
your heart can hold
Please say si si
say you
And your spanish eyes
will wait for me
Blue spanish eyes
prettiest eyes in
All of mexico
true spanish eyes
Please smile for me
once more before I go
Soon I’ll return
bringing you
All the love
your heart can hold
Please say si si
say you
And your spanish eyes
will wait for me
You and your
spanish eyes
Will wait
for me-
